sub_title: EMEA Senior Finance Manager at Epredia
summary: Experienced Finance Professional and MT-member/sparring partner with a demonstrated history of working in a complex matrix-structured commercial business environment. Skilled in Financial Accounting, Management Reporting, SAP FI/CO, Microsoft Excel and Analytical skills. Strong accounting professional with a Bachelor focused in Auditing.

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities and achievements:
o	Managing the Benelux Accounting Team (10 direct and 2 indirect reports), which is performing Purchase to Pay (P2P), Order to Cash (O2C), Cash & Banking (C&B) and Record to Report (R2R) for two legal entities (€ 175M revenue and 230 employees), including an (outsourced) European Distribution Center
o	Member of Breda Management Team
o	Ensure internal controls are in place and improve financial processes
o	Controllership activities for the (outsourced) European Distribution Center and approx. 800 consignment stock locations across Europe, including procedural coordination of warehouse cycle counts and car stock counts 
o	Responsible for compliancy for 18 VAT-registrations of the two entities
o	Budget vs Actual reporting and analysis for internal management purposes
o	Setting up network structure for Finance department

Projects:
o	Transition of entire local Finance department to Budapest and Paisley (completion per end of 2019), including Change Management and implementation of new tools (Concur, Coupa)
o	3 large business integrations in European Distribution Center and a divesture project: in this cross-departmental project I was involved for compliancy and accuracy, whereby deadlines were met and projects went live as expected
o	Project management for several site related and European projects (e.g. SAP retrofit, peer reviews, Stress reducing project)
o	SAP and HFM training sessions in South-Korea and South-Africa for local Finance teams

Successfully delivered within the 9 months set deadline.
